dataIdInfo.idAbs: Finda all buildings potentailly outside hydrant coverage.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Jarrett Keifer, James Kivley, Tualatin Valley Water District

tool.name: FindUncoveredBuildings

param.name: in_taxlots
param.displayname: Cracked Tax Lot (Parcel) Polyline Features
param.dialogReference: Tax lot edge feature class
param.pythonReference: Tax lot edge feature class

param.name: tlid
param.displayname: Tax Lot Identifer Field
param.dialogReference: Tax lot ID field in the tax lot edge feature class
param.pythonReference: Tax lot ID field in the tax lot edge feature class

param.name: in_hydrants
param.displayname: Hydrant Point Features
param.dialogReference: Fire hydrants feature class
param.pythonReference: Fire hydrants feature class

param.name: in_buildings
param.displayname: Building Features
param.dialogReference: Buildings feature class
param.pythonReference: Buildings feature class

param.name: buildingtlid
param.displayname: Tax Lot Identifer Field in Buildings Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Tax lot ID field in the buildings feature class
param.pythonReference: Tax lot ID field in the buildings feature class

param.name: in_streets
param.displayname: Street Centerlines
param.dialogReference: Street centerlines feature class
param.pythonReference: Street centerlines feature class

param.name: in_streetND
param.displayname: Street Network Dataset
param.dialogReference: Network dataset created from street centerlines
param.pythonReference: Network dataset created from street centerlines

param.name: buffDist
param.displayname: Hydrant Buffer/Service Area Length (in units from the hydrant feature class)
param.dialogReference: Service area length: the maximum distances to draw service lines from hydrant, follow street centerlines
param.pythonReference: Service area length: the maximum distances to draw service lines from hydrant, follow street centerlines

param.name: serviceAreaWidth
param.displayname: Hydrant Service Area Width (in units from the hydrant feature class)
param.dialogReference: Service area width: the distance by which to buffer the sides of the service lines created by following the street centerlines away from the hydrants. Distance is for one side only: a distance of 100 feet (recommended) will create service areas 200 feet wide.
param.pythonReference: Service area width: the distance by which to buffer the sides of the service lines created by following the street centerlines away from the hydrants. Distance is for one side only: a distance of 100 feet (recommended) will create service areas 200 feet wide.

param.name: accessModel
param.displayname: Model Access to Front of Tax Lots Only
param.dialogReference: Whether to model access to buildings from front tax lot edges only, or from all right-of-way accessible sides of tax lots.
param.pythonReference: Whether to model access to buildings from front tax lot edges only, or from all right-of-way accessible sides of tax lots. Boolean.

param.name: tlstreet
param.displayname: Tax Lot Address Street Name Field
param.dialogReference: Streetname field in the tax lot edge feature class with the street name from the original tax lot features. Required for front access only model. Used to match with street streetname field.
param.pythonReference: Streetname field in the tax lot edge feature class with the street name from the original tax lot features. Required for front access only model. Used to match with street streetname field.

param.name: allocationstreet
param.displayname: Allocation Street Name Field
param.dialogReference: Streetname field in the tax lot edge feature class with the street name from the allocation features (originally from the street centerlines). Required for front access only model. Used to match with tax lot streetname field.
param.pythonReference: Streetname field in the tax lot edge feature class with the street name from the allocation features (originally from the street centerlines). Required for front access only model. Used to match with tax lot streetname field.

param.name: thresh
param.displayname: Use Distance Threshold
param.dialogReference: Selects whether to exclude hydrants greater than a given distance from a street centerline.
param.pythonReference: Selects whether to exclude hydrants greater than a given distance from a street centerline. Boolean.

param.name: threshDist
param.displayname: Threshold Distance (in units from the hydrant feature class)
param.dialogReference: Threshold distance for excluding hydrants. Any hydrants a greater distance from a street centerline will be excluded from the analysis.Required if using threshold, otherwise ignored.
param.pythonReference: Threshold distance for excluding hydrants. Any hydrants a greater distance from a street centerline will be excluded from the analysis.Required if using threshold, otherwise ignored.

param.name: flags
param.displayname: Use Distance Flags
param.dialogReference: Selects whether to flag hydrants greater than a given distance from a street centerline.
param.pythonReference: Selects whether to flag hydrants greater than a given distance from a street centerline. Boolean.

param.name: flagDist
param.displayname: Flag Distance (in units from the hydrant feature class)
param.dialogReference: Threshold distance for flagging hydrants. Any hydrants a greater distance from a street centerline will be flagged in the output hydrant table.Required if using flags, otherwise ignored.
param.pythonReference: Threshold distance for flagging hydrants. Any hydrants a greater distance from a street centerline will be flagged in the output hydrant table.Required if using flags, otherwise ignored.

param.name: out_workspace
param.displayname: Output Workspace
param.dialogReference: Path to a geodatabase to use for the output workspace.
param.pythonReference: Path to a geodatabase to use for the output workspace.

param.name: uncoveredName
param.displayname: Name for Uncovered Buildings Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Name of the uncovered buildings output feature class. Default is uncoveredBuildings_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the uncovered buildings output feature class. Default is uncoveredBuildings_<service_area_length>.

param.name: coveredName
param.displayname: Name for Covered Buildings Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Name of the covered buildings output feature class. Default is coveredBuildings_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the covered buildings output feature class. Default is coveredBuildings_<service_area_length>.

param.name: bufferName
param.displayname: Name for Hydrant Buffers Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Name of the hydrant buffers output feature class. Default is hydrants_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the hydrant buffers output feature class. Default is hydrants_<service_area_length>.

param.name: serviceLineName
param.displayname: Name for Hydrant Service Lines Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Name of the hydrant service lines output feature class. Default is serviceLines_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the hydrant service lines output feature class. Default is serviceLines_<service_area_length>.

param.name: serviceAreaName
param.displayname: Name for Hydrant Service Areas Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Name of the hydrant service areas output feature class. Default is serviceAreas_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the hydrant service areas output feature class. Default is serviceAreas_<service_area_length>.

param.name: hydrantCoverageName
param.displayname: Name for Hydrant Coverage Count Table
param.dialogReference: Name of the hydrant properties output table. Default is hydrantCoverage_<service_area_length>.
param.pythonReference: Name of the hydrant properties output table. Default is hydrantCoverage_<service_area_length>.

tool.summary: Finda all buildings potentailly outside hydrant coverage.
